nodes.text: 9RU-MP was a gruff red-plated BB-series astromech droid in the service of the Resistance. At some point 9RU-MP met B1-series battle droid R0-GR at the repair bay aboard the Raddus. R0-GR would later include 9RU-MP in his book Droidography.

9RU-MP had multiple cicular tool-bay disks. Its head stayed on its body with the use of magnetic balancing, it had an antenna and a black sensor. 9RU-MP also had an internal orbiculate motivator powered by a selenium drive.
9RU-MP first appeared in the ILMxLAB virtual reality experience Star Wars: Droid Repair Bay.
